# Government Tender Announcement: Earth Observation Data Analytic System Prototype

**Verse/Version:** English
**Title/Titre:** Earth Observation (EO) Data Analytic System Prototype (Digital Earth Canada)

## **Reference and Solicitation Information**

* **Reference Number/Numéro de référence:** WS4042470345-Doc4042494069
* **Solicitation Number/Nom de la sollicitation:** WS4042470345
* **Amendment Number/Numéro de modification:** 7
* **Publication Date/Date de publication:** August 15, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date/Date limite des soumissions:** October 17, 2023, 2:00 PM (EDT)

## **Procurement Information**

* **Contracting Entity/Nom de l'entité contractante:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Contracting Entity Address/Ligne d'adresse de l'entité contractante:** 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Québec, K1A 0S5, Canada
* **Notice Type/Type d'avis:** Request for Proposal
* **Procurement Method/Méthode d'approvisionnement:** Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria/Critères de sélection:** Highest Technical Merit within a Stipulated Maximum Budget
* **Regions of Delivery/Regions de livraison:** Canada

## **Project Overview**

Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC), on behalf of the Canadian Space Agency (CSA), is seeking proposals to develop an Earth Observation (EO) Data Analytic System Prototype. The project aims to create a digital platform that can analyze satellite data to provide valuable insights. The successful bidder will provide the complete scope of work as outlined in Annex A – Statement of Work. The contract period is expected to be 9 months.

## **Submission Instructions**

All required supporting documents and bids must be submitted electronically through SAP Ariba: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17170357, by October 17, 2023, at 2:00 PM EDT. Any bids received after this time will be considered non-responsive.
